name: PROJECT HOPE INDIA - THE PEOPLE TO PEOPLE HEALTH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Mission:We enable health workers to have the greatest positive impact on the health of the people they serve.Vision:A world where everyone has the health care needed to reach life’s full potential.Our Values : We care about results.We are accountable to our commitments.We can do more because we collaborate.We cultivate local talent.We work with purpose.Build the health care workforce capacity through training, technical assistance and mentoring•Strengthen links between households, communities, and health facilities to ensure a strong continuum of care•Provide public education to encourage health behaviors, prevent disease, and recognize health emergencies•Collaborate with governments and key stakeholders to identify needs
